author: pietjepuk
content:
These questions are better asked in <#672059911034634243> or <#595721451651465227> (or some other Discord server entirely). This channel and entire server is mostly for technical talk between people working on eth1x. 

August 2021 probably refers to the London upgrade/hard fork, which is mostly about EIP-1559. See https://hackmd.io/@timbeiko/1559-updates/https%3A%2F%2Fhackmd.io%2F%40timbeiko%2F1559-resources for details on what it does.

Work on "The Merge" (i.e. swapping the consensus protocol of the Eth chain from PoW to PoS) is underway in a more exploratory fashion. Check out <#692062809701482577> and <#826479341784662056> if you're interested in keeping up with developments on that front. No definitive timeline yet for that, although Q1 2022 has been given as a rough estimate to miners for their ROI calculations.
